Passport Pay

Scan a customer’s **passport URL** (or enter it), then charge the total from your POS.

Charge Customer

Tip: This may auto-fill when launched from an NFC tag.

How it Works

  1. Have the customer present their **passport card / bracelet / phone**.
  2. Your NFC reader opens this page with `?pid=…` auto-filled.
  3. Enter the **final total** from your POS and click **Charge**.

Best practice: this page can open in a **new tab** per customer; close it after each charge.
